attributes.action: Get Child Soldiers on the school curriculum
attributes.additional_details:
This may not sound such a serious issue at first but believe me it is! We are trying to achieve getting the subject of Child Soldiers on the school curriculum. We're trying to get this because Not Enough! people know or understand anything about child soldiers! Not enough people are trying to do anything about child soldiers!
 if we got the subject of child soldiers on the schools curriculum then much more children will gain knowledge and understanding of this issue and obviously then much more people outside of school will learn and hear about this too!
once people know and understand about the terrible things young children are Forced and compelled to do! many more people will take a stand and try to do something about saving these child soldiers!
So sign now and you could help change lives in the future! without this knowledge there will be know achievement.
